sns_root.init_args: (record { governance_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}"; ledger_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; swap_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_swap}}"; index_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_index}}"; dapps = vec {}; archive_canister_ids = vec {}; latest_version = opt record {major=0; minor=0; patch=0}})

sns_governance.init_args: (record { root_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}"; ledger_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; swap_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_swap}}"; parameters = opt record { neuron_minimum_stake_e8s = 100_000_000; max_dissolve_delay_seconds = 252_460_800; max_neuron_age_for_age_bonus_seconds = 126_230_400; max_dissolve_delay_bonus_percentage = 100; max_age_bonus_percentage = 25; initial_voting_period_seconds = 345_600; wait_for_quiet_deadline_increase_seconds = 86_400; transaction_fee_e8s = 10_000; proposal_rejection_fee_e8s = 100_000_000; };})

sns_ledger.init_args: (record { minting_account = record { owner = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}" }; initial_balances = vec {}; transfer_fee = 10_000; token_name = "My SNS Token"; token_symbol = "MST"; metadata = vec {}; archive_options = record { num_blocks_to_archive = 1000; trigger_threshold = 2000; controller_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}" } })

sns_swap.init_args: (record { nns_governance_canister_id = principal "rrkah-fqaaa-aaaaa-aaaaq-cai"; sns_governance_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_governance}}"; sns_root_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_root}}"; sns_ledger_canister_id = principal "{{canisterId:sns_ledger}}"; fallback_controller_principal_ids = vec { principal "blmyj-3vn2k-4bepw-gjtre-gx7au-xcec2-zitym-kxm7j-yzgqg-k6ztg-fae" }; transaction_fee_e8s = opt 10_000; neuron_basket_construction_parameters = opt record { count = 2; dissolve_delay_interval_seconds = 2630016 }; })
